name: The GIGA CHANGE
description:
EN------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This prototype is about a physical change thanks to sports, or at least that was what I meant. The game's theme was built mainly around the Gigachad meme, this is a popularity advantage and it's visualy relationated with sports. The graphs in-game couldn't be polished due to lack of time.

Survey about the game (complete this survey after playing the game):  https://forms.gle/4DgQ7G8Mcbko9Vuc6

ES-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Este prototipo va sobre realizar un cambio físico, o al menos esa es la intención. La temática del juego gira entorno al meme del Gigachad, ya que es un punto a favor de popularidad y visualmente está enlazado al deporte. El aspecto visual in-game no pudo ser pulido por temas de tiempo.

Encuesta sobre el juego (realizar después de jugarlo): https://forms.gle/4DgQ7G8Mcbko9Vuc6
